216.title: Logan
216.summary: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.
216.prod: James Mangold (dir.), Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart

217.title: Platoon
217.summary: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.
217.prod: Oliver Stone (dir.), Charlie Sheen, Tom Berenger

214.title: The Handmaiden
214.summary: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.
214.prod: Chan-wook Park (dir.), Kim Min-hee, Jung-woo Ha

215.title: Cool Hand Luke
215.summary: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.
215.prod: Stuart Rosenberg (dir.), Paul Newman, George Kennedy

212.title: Ben-Hur
212.summary: After a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.
212.prod: William Wyler (dir.), Charlton Heston, Jack Hawkins

213.title: Hachi: A Dog's Tale
213.summary: A college professor bonds with an abandoned dog he takes into his home.
213.prod: Lasse Hallström (dir.), Richard Gere, Joan Allen

210.title: Stand by Me
210.summary: After the death of one of his friends, a writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.
210.prod: Rob Reiner (dir.), Wil Wheaton, River Phoenix

211.title: Network
211.summary: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit.
211.prod: Sidney Lumet (dir.), Faye Dunaway, William Holden

165.title: Jurassic Park
165.summary: A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.
165.prod: Steven Spielberg (dir.), Sam Neill, Laura Dern

218.title: Into the Wild
218.summary: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.
218.prod: Sean Penn (dir.), Emile Hirsch, Vince Vaughn

219.title: The Wages of Fear
219.summary: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.
219.prod: Henri-Georges Clouzot (dir.), Yves Montand, Charles Vanel

133.title: Unforgiven
133.summary: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."
133.prod: Clint Eastwood (dir.), Clint Eastwood, Gene Hackman

132.title: Ran
132.summary: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.
132.prod: Akira Kurosawa (dir.), Tatsuya Nakadai, Akira Terao

131.title: Children of Heaven
131.summary: After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.
131.prod: Majid Majidi (dir.), Mohammad Amir Naji, Amir Farrokh Hashemian

130.title: Downfall
130.summary: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.
130.prod: Oliver Hirschbiegel (dir.), Bruno Ganz, Alexandra Maria Lara

137.title: All About Eve
137.summary: A seemingly timid but secretly ruthless ingénue insinuates herself into the lives of an aging Broadway star and her circle of theater friends.
137.prod: Joseph L. Mankiewicz (dir.), Bette Davis, Anne Baxter

136.title: Howl's Moving Castle
136.summary: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.
136.prod: Hayao Miyazaki (dir.), Chieko Baishô, Takuya Kimura

135.title: Zack Snyder's Justice League
135.summary: Determined to ensure Superman's ultimate sacrifice was not in vain, Bruce Wayne aligns forces with Diana Prince with plans to recruit a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions.
135.prod: Zack Snyder (dir.), Henry Cavill, Ben Affleck

134.title: Some Like It Hot
134.summary: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.
134.prod: Billy Wilder (dir.), Marilyn Monroe, Tony Curtis

139.title: A Beautiful Mind
139.summary: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.
139.prod: Ron Howard (dir.), Russell Crowe, Ed Harris

138.title: Casino
138.summary: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast-living and fast-loving socialite.
138.prod: Martin Scorsese (dir.), Robert De Niro, Sharon Stone

166.title: Trainspotting
166.summary: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.
166.prod: Danny Boyle (dir.), Ewan McGregor, Ewen Bremner

24.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
24.summary: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.
24.prod: George Lucas (dir.), Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford

25.title: Saving Private Ryan
25.summary: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
25.prod: Steven Spielberg (dir.), Tom Hanks, Matt Damon

26.title: The Green Mile
26.summary: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
26.prod: Frank Darabont (dir.), Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan

27.title: Spirited Away
27.summary: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.
27.prod: Hayao Miyazaki (dir.), Daveigh Chase, Suzanne Pleshette

20.title: Life Is Beautiful
20.summary: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.
20.prod: Roberto Benigni (dir.), Roberto Benigni, Nicoletta Braschi

21.title: City of God
21.summary: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.
21.prod: Fernando Meirelles (dir.), Alexandre Rodrigues, Leandro Firmino

22.title: The Silence of the Lambs
22.summary: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.
22.prod: Jonathan Demme (dir.), Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins

23.title: It's a Wonderful Life
23.summary: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.
23.prod: Frank Capra (dir.), James Stewart, Donna Reed

160.title: The Elephant Man
160.summary: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.
160.prod: David Lynch (dir.), Anthony Hopkins, John Hurt

28.title: Interstellar
28.summary: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
28.prod: Christopher Nolan (dir.), Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway

29.title: Parasite
29.summary: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.
29.prod: Bong Joon Ho (dir.), Kang-ho Song, Lee Sun-kyun

161.title: The Seventh Seal
161.summary: A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.
161.prod: Ingmar Bergman (dir.), Max von Sydow, Gunnar Björnstrand

0.title: The Shawshank Redemption
0.summary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
0.prod: Frank Darabont (dir.), Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman

4.title: 12 Angry Men
4.summary: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.
4.prod: Sidney Lumet (dir.), Henry Fonda, Lee J. Cobb

8.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
8.summary: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.
8.prod: Sergio Leone (dir.), Clint Eastwood, Eli Wallach

163.title: The Sixth Sense
163.summary: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.
163.prod: M. Night Shyamalan (dir.), Bruce Willis, Haley Joel Osment

119.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
119.summary: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his children against prejudice.
119.prod: Robert Mulligan (dir.), Gregory Peck, John Megna

120.title: Up
120.summary: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.
120.prod: Pete Docter (dir.), Edward Asner, Jordan Nagai

121.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
121.summary: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Professor Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. finds himself up against Adolf Hitler's Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.
121.prod: Steven Spielberg (dir.), Harrison Ford, Sean Connery

122.title: Heat
122.summary: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.
122.prod: Michael Mann (dir.), Al Pacino, Robert De Niro

123.title: L.A. Confidential
123.summary: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.
123.prod: Curtis Hanson (dir.), Kevin Spacey, Russell Crowe

124.title: Green Book
124.summary: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver of an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.
124.prod: Peter Farrelly (dir.), Viggo Mortensen, Mahershala Ali

125.title: Die Hard
125.summary: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.
125.prod: John McTiernan (dir.), Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman

126.title: Batman Begins
126.summary: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.
126.prod: Christopher Nolan (dir.), Christian Bale, Michael Caine

127.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
127.summary: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.
127.prod: Terry Gilliam (dir.), Graham Chapman, John Cleese

128.title: Yojimbo
128.summary: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.
128.prod: Akira Kurosawa (dir.), Toshirô Mifune, Eijirô Tôno

129.title: Rashômon
129.summary: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.
129.prod: Akira Kurosawa (dir.), Toshirô Mifune, Machiko Kyô

167.title: The Truman Show
167.summary: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.
167.prod: Peter Weir (dir.), Jim Carrey, Ed Harris

118.title: Double Indemnity
118.summary: An insurance representative lets himself be talked by a seductive housewife into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses the suspicion of an insurance investigator.
118.prod: Billy Wilder (dir.), Fred MacMurray, Barbara Stanwyck

59.title: Paths of Glory
59.summary: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.
59.prod: Stanley Kubrick (dir.), Kirk Douglas, Ralph Meeker

58.title: Hamilton
58.summary: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.
58.prod: Thomas Kail (dir.), Lin-Manuel Miranda, Phillipa Soo

55.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
55.summary: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

54.title: The Great Dictator
54.summary: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.
54.prod: Charles Chaplin (dir.), Charles Chaplin, Paulette Goddard

57.title: The Lives of Others

57.prod: Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck (dir.), Ulrich Mühe, Martina Gedeck

56.title: Django Unchained
56.summary: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.
56.prod: Quentin Tarantino (dir.), Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz

51.title: Alien
51.summary: After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

50.title: Rear Window
50.summary: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.
50.prod: Alfred Hitchcock (dir.), James Stewart, Grace Kelly

53.title: Memento
53.summary: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.
53.prod: Christopher Nolan (dir.), Guy Pearce, Carrie-Anne Moss

52.title: Apocalypse Now
52.summary: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.
52.prod: Francis Ford Coppola (dir.), Martin Sheen, Marlon Brando

164.title: Klaus
164.summary: A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.
164.prod: Sergio Pablos (dir.), Jason Schwartzman, J.K. Simmons

201.title: 12 Years a Slave
201.summary: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.
201.prod: Steve McQueen (dir.), Chiwetel Ejiofor, Michael Kenneth Williams

199.title: How to Train Your Dragon
199.summary: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.
199.prod: Dean DeBlois (dir.), Jay Baruchel, Gerard Butler

179.title: Tokyo Story
179.summary: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.
179.prod: Yasujirô Ozu (dir.), Chishû Ryû, Chieko Higashiyama

200.title: Ford v Ferrari
200.summary: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.
200.prod: James Mangold (dir.), Matt Damon, Christian Bale

195.title: The Big Lebowski
195.summary: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.
195.prod: Joel Coen (dir.), Jeff Bridges, John Goodman

194.title: Sherlock Jr.
194.summary: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.
194.prod: Buster Keaton (dir.), Buster Keaton, Kathryn McGuire

197.title: The General
197.summary: When Union spies steal an engineer's beloved locomotive, he pursues it single-handedly and straight through enemy lines.
197.prod: Clyde Bruckman (dir.), Buster Keaton, Marion Mack

178.title: Room
178.summary: Held captive for 7 years in an enclosed space, a woman and her young son finally gain their freedom, allowing the boy to experience the outside world for the first time.
178.prod: Lenny Abrahamson (dir.), Brie Larson, Jacob Tremblay

191.title: Prisoners
191.summary: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.
191.prod: Denis Villeneuve (dir.), Hugh Jackman, Jake Gyllenhaal

190.title: Hacksaw Ridge
190.summary: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people, and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.
190.prod: Mel Gibson (dir.), Andrew Garfield, Sam Worthington

193.title: Andhadhun
193.summary: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

192.title: Persona
192.summary: A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their personae are melding together.
192.prod: Ingmar Bergman (dir.), Bibi Andersson, Liv Ullmann

115.title: Metropolis
115.summary: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.
115.prod: Fritz Lang (dir.), Brigitte Helm, Alfred Abel

114.title: Amélie
114.summary: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.
114.prod: Jean-Pierre Jeunet (dir.), Audrey Tautou, Mathieu Kassovitz

88.title: Reservoir Dogs
88.summary: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.
88.prod: Quentin Tarantino (dir.), Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth

89.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
89.summary: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.

111.title: Toy Story 3
111.summary: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

110.title: A Separation
110.summary: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.
110.prod: Asghar Farhadi (dir.), Payman Maadi, Leila Hatami

113.title: Lawrence of Arabia
113.summary: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

112.title: The Sting
112.summary: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.
112.prod: George Roy Hill (dir.), Paul Newman, Robert Redford

82.title: 3 Idiots

83.title: Amadeus

83.prod: Milos Forman (dir.), F. Murray Abraham, Tom Hulce

80.title: Das Boot

81.title: Toy Story
81.summary: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.
81.prod: John Lasseter (dir.), Tom Hanks, Tim Allen

86.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

87.title: Taare Zameen Par
87.summary: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.
87.prod: Aamir Khan (dir.), Darsheel Safary, Aamir Khan

84.title: Inglourious Basterds

85.title: Good Will Hunting
85.summary: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.
85.prod: Gus Van Sant (dir.), Robin Williams, Matt Damon

198.title: To Be or Not to Be
198.summary: During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

206.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
206.summary: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

226.title: Spotlight

3.summary: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

177.title: Wild Tales

247.title: Drishyam

245.title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion
245.summary: Concurrent theatrical ending of the TV series Shin seiki evangerion (1995).

244.title: It Happened One Night

108.title: Taxi Driver

108.prod: Martin Scorsese (dir.), Robert De Niro, Jodie Foster

109.title: Incendies
109.summary: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

241.title: Paris, Texas

240.title: Rififi
240.summary: Four men plan a technically perfect crime, but the human element intervenes...
240.prod: Jules Dassin (dir.), Jean Servais, Carl Möhner

243.title: Portrait of a Lady on Fire
243.summary: On an isolated island in Brittany at the end of the eighteenth century, a female painter is obliged to paint a wedding portrait of a young woman.

242.title: Drishyam
242.summary: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

102.title: Snatch

106.title: Scarface

104.title: North by Northwest

39.title: Gladiator

31.title: Hara-Kiri

37.title: American History X

35.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
35.summary: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

34.title: The Pianist

246.title: A Silent Voice: The Movie

208.summary: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.
208.prod: Clint Eastwood (dir.), Hilary Swank, Clint Eastwood

148.title: My Neighbor Totoro
148.summary: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.
148.prod: Hayao Miyazaki (dir.), Hitoshi Takagi, Noriko Hidaka

149.title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
149.summary: Two Americans searching for work in Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.
149.prod: John Huston (dir.), Humphrey Bogart, Walter Huston

77.title: American Beauty
77.summary: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.
77.prod: Sam Mendes (dir.), Kevin Spacey, Annette Bening

76.title: Capharnaüm
76.summary: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.
76.prod: Nadine Labaki (dir.), Zain Al Rafeea, Yordanos Shiferaw

75.title: Avengers: Endgame
75.summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.
75.prod: Anthony Russo (dir.), Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans

74.title: Coco
74.summary: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.
74.prod: Lee Unkrich (dir.), Anthony Gonzalez, Gael García Bernal

73.title: Aliens
73.summary: Fifty-seven years after surviving an apocalyptic attack aboard her space vessel by merciless space creatures, Officer Ripley awakens from hyper-sleep and tries to warn anyone who will listen about the predators.
73.prod: James Cameron (dir.), Sigourney Weaver, Michael Biehn

72.title: Your Name.
72.summary: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?
72.prod: Makoto Shinkai (dir.), Ryûnosuke Kamiki, Mone Kamishiraishi

71.title: Once Upon a Time in America
71.summary: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.
71.prod: Sergio Leone (dir.), Robert De Niro, James Woods

70.title: The Dark Knight Rises
70.summary: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.
70.prod: Christopher Nolan (dir.), Christian Bale, Tom Hardy

79.title: High and Low
79.summary: An executive of a shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped and held for ransom.
79.prod: Akira Kurosawa (dir.), Toshirô Mifune, Yutaka Sada

78.title: Braveheart
78.summary: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.
78.prod: Mel Gibson (dir.), Mel Gibson, Sophie Marceau

249.title: The Invisible Guest
249.summary: A successful entrepreneur accused of murder and a witness preparation expert have less than three hours to come up with an impregnable defense.
249.prod: Oriol Paulo (dir.), Mario Casas, Ana Wagener

227.title: Hotel Rwanda
227.summary: Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.
227.prod: Terry George (dir.), Don Cheadle, Sophie Okonedo
